mapper.sql: s.id, s.userID, s.positionID, s.settlementMoney, s.settlementDate, s.state, s.settlementID, s.createTime, s.updateTime, s.version, s.isDeleted, s.createBy, s.updateBy

where 1=1 and s.id = #{condition.id} and s.userID = #{condition.userID} and s.positionID = #{condition.positionID} and s.settlementMoney = #{condition.settlementMoney} and s.settlementDate = #{condition.settlementDate} and s.state = #{condition.state} and s.settlementID = #{condition.settlementID} and s.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and s.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and s.version = #{condition.version} and s.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and s.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and s.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy}

where 1=1 and s.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(s.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(s.positionID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.positionID}),'%')) and UPPER(s.settlementMoney) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.settlementMoney}),'%')) and UPPER(s.settlementDate) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.settlementDate}),'%')) and UPPER(s.state) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.state}),'%')) and UPPER(s.settlementID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.settlementID}),'%')) and UPPER(s.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(s.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(s.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(s.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%'))
mapper.update: update settlementperson set userID=#{userID}, positionID=#{positionID}, settlementMoney=#{settlementMoney}, settlementDate=#{settlementDate}, state=#{state}, settlementID=#{settlementID}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from settlementperson s where s.id = #{id} and s.isDeleted = false
select ,p.title from settlementperson s left join position p on p.id = s.positionID ${orderByClause}
SELECT count(s.id) as totalCount , IFNULl( sum(if(s.state=1,1,0)) ,0) as confirmed ,IFNULL(sum(s.settlementMoney),0) as totalmoney FROM settlementperson s
SELECT s.createTime,s.settlementMoney,s.state FROM settlementperson s ${orderByClause} limit 0,1
SELECT SUM(settlementMoney) FROM settlementperson WHERE userID = #{id} AND state = 1
mapper.sql: s.id as 'id', s.version as 'version',s.userID as 'userID',s.positionID as 'positionID',s.settlementMoney as 'settlementMoney',s.settlementDate as 'settlementDate',s.state as 'state',s.settlementID as 'settlementID', settlement.id as 'settlement.id', settlement.version as 'settlement.version',settlement.settlementOrderNumber as 'settlement.settlementOrderNumber',settlement.remarks as 'settlement.remarks',settlement.settlementState as 'settlement.settlementState',settlement.platformState as 'settlement.platformState',settlement.type as 'settlement.type',settlement.userID as 'settlement.userID',settlement.thirdPlatform as 'settlement.thirdPlatform',settlement.thirdOrderNumber as 'settlement.thirdOrderNumber',settlement.launchTime as 'settlement.launchTime',settlement.payTime as 'settlement.payTime',settlement.callbackTime as 'settlement.callbackTime'
mapper.select: select from settlementperson s left join settlement settlement on s.settlementID = settlement.id ${orderByClause}
select from settlementperson s left join settlement settlement on s.settlementID = settlement.refID ${orderByClause} limit 0,1
mapper.sql: p.id as 'id', p.version as 'version',p.title as 'title',p.salaryType as 'salaryType',p.recruitStartTime as 'recruitStartTime',p.recruitEndTime as 'recruitEndTime',p.salary as 'salary',p.dailySalary as 'dailySalary',p.liquidatedDamages as 'liquidatedDamages',p.recruitsSum as 'recruitsSum',p.sexRequirements as 'sexRequirements',p.workPalce as 'workPalce',p.workDate as 'endTime', workPlace.id as 'workPlace.id', workPlace.version as 'workPlace.version',workPlace.cityID as 'workPlace.cityID',workPlace.detailedAddress as 'workPlace.detailedAddress',workPlace.longitude as 'workPlace.longitude',workPlace.latitude as 'workPlace.latitude', city.id as 'workPlace.city.id', city.version as 'workPlace.city.version',city.pinyin as 'workPlace.city.pinyin',city.cityName as 'workPlace.city.cityName',city.zipCode as 'workPlace.city.zipCode',city.openState as 'workPlace.city.openState',city.cityType as 'workPlace.city.cityType',city.isHot as 'workPlace.city.isHot', huntingtype.id as 'huntingtype.id', huntingtype.version as 'huntingtype.version',huntingtype.name as 'huntingtype.name',huntingtype.HTFatCode as 'huntingtype.HTFatCode',huntingtype.state as 'huntingtype.state',huntingtype.codeGrade as 'huntingtype.codeGrade', settlementpersonList.id as 'settlementpersonList.id', settlementpersonList.version as 'settlementpersonList.user.weChatNo',user.nickName as 'settlementpersonList.user.nickName',user.sex as 'settlementpersonList.user.sex',user.phoneNumber as 'settlementpersonList.user.phoneNumber',user.lastLoginTime as 'settlementpersonList.user.lastLoginTime',user.loginTime as 'settlementpersonList.user.loginTime',user.status as 'settlementpersonList.user.infoHeadImg',user.locked as 'settlementpersonList.user.locked',user.userSig as 'settlementpersonList.user.userSig',user.birthday as 'settlementpersonList.user.birthday', attachment.id as 'settlementpersonList.user.attachment.id', attachment.version as 'settlementpersonList.user.attachment.version',attachment.datestr as 'settlementpersonList.user.attachment.datestr',attachment.path as 'settlementpersonList.user.attachment.path',attachment.name as 'settlementpersonList.user.attachment.name',attachment.title as mapper.select: select ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM signin GROUP BY DAY(signTime)) a WHERE a.userID = user.id AND a.positionID = p.id ) AS "settlementpersonList.user.signinCount" from position p left join localtioninfo workPlace on p.workPalce = workPlace.id left join city city on workPlace.cityID = city.id left join huntingtype huntingtype on p.workTypeID = huntingtype.id left join settlementperson settlementpersonList on p.id = settlementpersonList.positionID left join shiro_user user on settlementpersonList.userID = user.id left join attachment attachment on user.infoHeadImg = attachment.id WHERE p.userID = #{condition.userID} AND p.open = #{condition.open} AND p.type = #{condition.type} AND p.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} AND settlementpersonList.state = #{condition.state} AND p.id=#{condition.positionID}
mapper.sql: s.id as 'id', s.version as 'version',s.userID as 'userID',s.positionID as 'positionID',s.settlementMoney as 'settlementMoney',s.settlementDate as 'settlementDate',s.state as 'state',s.settlementID as 'settlementID', position.id as 'position.id', position.version as 'position.version',position.title as 'position.title',position.salaryType as 'position.salaryType',position.recruitStartTime as 'position.recruitStartTime',position.recruitEndTime as 'position.recruitEndTime',position.salary as 'position.salary',position.dailySalary as 'position.dailySalary',position.liquidatedDamages as 'position.liquidatedDamages',position.recruitsSum as 'position.recruitsSum',position.sexRequirements as 'position.sexRequirements',position.workPalce as 'position.workPalce',position.workDate as 'position.workDate',position.aggregate as 'position.aggregate',position.setDate as 'position.setDate',position.contacts as 'position.contacts',position.contactNumber as 'position.contactNumber',position.settlement as 'position.settlement',position.matters as 'position.matters',position.jobRequirements as 'position.jobRequirements',position.jobContent as 'position.jobContent',position.includeBoard as 'position.includeBoard',position.controlSleep as 'position.controlSleep',position.interview as 'position.interview',position.baseTask as 'position.baseTask',position.commission as 'position.commission',position.train as 'position.train',position.beenRecruitedSum as 'position.beenRecruitedSum',position.workTypeID as 'position.workTypeID',position.userID as 'position.userID',position.open as 'position.open',position.type as 'position.type',position.startTime as 'position.startTime',position.endTime as 'position.endTime'
mapper.select: select from settlementperson s left join position position on s.positionID = position.id ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: select from settlementperson s left join settlement settlement on s.settlementID = settlement.refID left join settlement settlement on s.settlementID = settlement.id left join position position on s.positionID = position.id AND settlement.settlementOrderNumber = #{condition.code} ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: s.id as 'id', s.version as 'version',s.userID as 'userID',s.positionID as 'positionID',s.settlementMoney as 'settlementMoney',s.settlementDate as 'settlementDate',s.state as 'state',s.settlementID as 'settlementID', settlement.id as 'settlement.id', settlement.version as 'settlement.version',settlement.settlementOrderNumber as 'settlement.settlementOrderNumber',settlement.remarks as 'settlement.remarks',settlement.settlementState as 'settlement.settlementState',settlement.platformState as 'settlement.platformState',settlement.type as 'settlement.type',settlement.userID as 'settlement.userID',settlement.thirdPlatform as 'settlement.thirdPlatform',settlement.thirdOrderNumber as 'settlement.thirdOrderNumber',settlement.launchTime as 'settlement.launchTime',settlement.payTime as 'settlement.payTime',settlement.callbackTime as 'settlement.callbackTime',settlement.refID as 'settlement.refID'
